item.description:
The name of the movie is New in Town.

I will be at the theater around 7 PM. The show starts at 7:40 and we will head into the theater at 7:20.

If the movie is showing upstairs, I will be near the tables by the big window at the top of the escalator. If the movie is showing downstairs, I will be just inside the ropes across from the concession stand.

Starring: Renée Zellweger, Harry Connick, Siobhan Fallon Hogan, J.K. Simmons, Frances Conroy, Mike O'Brien, Rashida Jones

Director: Jonas Elmer

Runtime: 1 hr 36 mins

Official web page:

http://www.newintownm...

Synopsis: In this romantic comedy, Renée Zellweger stars as Lucy Hill, a powerful businesswoman who feels right at home in glamorous Miami. But soon a business opportunity takes her to small town America, and she realizes that she may have found more there than just another way to climb the corporate ladder. Harry Connick Jr. costars as the object of Lucy's affection, and JUNO's J.K. Simmons also plays a role.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Boston Meetup Movie Badge.
item.name: New In Town
